title: Vintange Porsche Sans Serif ID
content:
Anyone know of any extended typefaces that are similar to the one used in 'Porsche'? Thanks in advanced.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822210417im_/http:/typophile.com/files/tumblr_mqawqhzYKh1qzmdqso1_1280_4986.jpg)
author: markmont

comments.content: Some similars, mainly personal digitizations (legitimacy?) and reinterpretations of these exclusive letterings: [Porsche](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822210417/http:/www.ffonts.net/porsche.font), [Porsche Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822210417/http:/www.9ss1.dk/porsche944/div2-uk.html), [911 Porscha](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822210417/http:/www.dafont.com/911porscha.font) and [Ultra 911](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822210417/http:/www.dafont.com/ultra911.font) by Iconian Fonts, [Korataki](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822210417/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/korataki) and [Sui Generis](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822210417/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/sui-generis) by Typodermic Ray Larabie, [Porsche](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822210417/http:/www.rennlist.com/font/index.htm)
